write_ic

Source: R/write_ic.R
write_ic.Rd

write_ic

Usage

write_ic(
  in.path,
  in.name,
  start_date,
  end_date,
  outfolder,
  model,
  new_site,
  pfts,
  source = input_veg$source,
  overwrite = FALSE,
  n.ensemble,
  host.inputargs,
  ...
)

Arguments

in.path

file path to rds file with IC data

in.name

file name of IC data

start_date

YYYY-MM-DD

end_date

YYYY-MM-DD

outfolder

Location to store function outputs

model

BETY model ID

new_site

Site info including lat, lon, and BETT site ID

pfts

list settings$pfts.

source

Data source as saved in the BETY db

overwrite

DEfault is FALSE. Option to overwrite existing files.

n.ensemble

number of ensemble members

host.inputargs

host info taken from settings object

...

Additional parameters

Author

Istem Fer
